even in this communist corner of the
Caribbean far from their spiritual home
a handful of Cuban Muslims faithfully
observed this most sacred of Islamic
rituals but the setting is far from
ideal in an abandoned playground they
are open to the elements and to the
stairs and inquisitive passers-by as

Muslim community is limited to
worshipping in either private homes or a
single prayer room at the Casa del a de
Bay a state-run museum to the country's
Arabic heritage but many young Cuban
Muslims say that Islam no longer belongs
in a museum
rather it is a living breathing and
expanding religion of the Communist
island grande una nueva Nico I'm part of

ral Castro to let his country build the

the turkeys petition may have come a
